review_text_liked: Balian Paradise Hotel is a little gem nestled just behind the main Balian Beach which is about 200meters walk. The hotel itself is basic but clean and very comfortable for the price. The rooms are minimalistic but have all the necessary comforts, bed with clean and fresh linen, fridge, kettle, great aircon, TV (netflix etc etc), bathroom. The pool area is small but adequate and is a delightful reprieve on those hot days when a quick cool down is a must!!. The restaurant attached to the hotel does basic meals nasi and mie goreng etc.....the Nasi in particular according to my travel buddys is the best they have tasted!! The staff are incredibly helpful and friendly at all times, no request is a bother for any of them. A lovely little hotel away from the hustle and bustle of the main bali areas.....dont expect fancy, but you will get a good base to come home to of an evening after exploring all the wonderful things on offer in the area. Highly recommend.
